A university club for hackers, problem solvers and IT security professionals.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
| FACEBOOK | 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[+]== WHO WE ARE ============================================================[+]
|                                                                              |
| We are a student led club who focus on the hands-on practical skills of      |
| ethical hacking and developing the skills needed to get started in           |
| cyber security. We welcome anyone and everyone regardless of skill.          |
| We aim to deliver a wide range of topics in the infosec world including      |
| forensics, web application testing, binary exploitation and more.            |
| You can read /kb for more.                                                   |
|                                                                              |
[+]==========================================================================[+]


[+]== WHAT WE DO ============================================================[+]
|                                                                              |
| At IUSEC we offer workshops, talks, competitions and more!                   |
| We host weekly meetups on the  campus on Wednesday evenings.                 |
|                                                                              |
[+]==========================================================================[+]


[+]== CONTACT US ============================================================[+]
|                                                                              |
| If you wish to get in contact, reach out on Facebook below.                  |
|                                                                              |
|   > Facebook                                                                 |
|                                                                              |
[+]==========================================================================[+]


[+]== EVENTS ================================================================[+]


IUSEC is run by students for students and is a non-profit making organisation.
